languages.text: "Мое сердце будет спокойно, раз Амик'Соломон и его зверь стерегут сон Домин. И что Вил'Джай не пробралась змеей в те священные палаты".
"It calms my heart to know that Amic'Solomorne and his beast guard the Domin's sleep. And that Vil'Jae will not be slithering her way into those sacred chambers."
languages.original_text: "Мое сердце будет спокойно, раз Амик'Соломон и его зверь стерегут сон Домин. И что Вил'Джай не пробралась змеей в те священные палаты".

traits.locale_text: "It calms my heart to know that Amic'Solomorne and his beast guard the Domin's sleep. And that Vil'Jae will not slither her way into those sacred chambers."

"It calms my heart to know that Amic'Solomorne and his beast guard the Domin's sleep. And that Vil'Jae will not be slithering her way into those sacred chambers."

languages.text: 「ソロモーンと彼の獣がドミンの眠りを守っていると知って、心が落ち着くわ。それにジェイがあの神聖な部屋に忍び込むことはないのも安心よ」
languages.original_text: "It calms my heart to know that Amic'Solomorne and his beast guard the Domin's sleep. And that Vil'Jae will not be slithering her way into those sacred chambers."

traits.locale_text: 「ソロモーンと彼の獣がドミンの眠りを守っていると知って、心が落ち着くわ。それにジェイがあの神聖な部屋に忍び込むことはないのも安心よ」

languages.text: "Es beruhigt mein Herz, dass Amic'Solomorne und seine Bestie den Schlaf {mf|des|der} Domin bewachen. Und dass Vil'Jae sich nicht in diese heiligen Kammern schlängeln wird."
languages.original_text: "It calms my heart to know that Amic'Solomorne and his beast guard the Domin's sleep. And that Vil'Jae will not be slithering her way into those sacred chambers."

traits.locale_text: "Es beruhigt mein Herz, dass Amic'Solomorne und seine Bestie den Schlaf {mf|des|der} Domin bewachen. Und dass Vil'Jae sich nicht in diese heiligen Kammern schlängeln wird."

languages.text: «Mi corazón se tranquiliza al saber que Amic'Solomorne y su bestia protegen el sueño de{mf|l| la} Domin, y que Vil'Jae no podrá entrar reptando en sus sagrados aposentos».
languages.original_text: "It calms my heart to know that Amic'Solomorne and his beast guard the Domin's sleep. And that Vil'Jae will not be slithering her way into those sacred chambers."

traits.locale_text: «Mi corazón se tranquiliza al saber que Amic'Solomorne y su bestia protegen el sueño de{mf|l| la} Domin, y que Vil'Jae no podrá entrar reptando en sus sagrados aposentos».

languages.text: “得知信者索罗蒙与他的猛犬会守护秘者的安眠，我的心里平静了不少。而且，这样一来，敌者婕伊就再也不会溜进那个神圣的房间了。”
languages.original_text: "It calms my heart to know that Amic'Solomorne and his beast guard the Domin's sleep. And that Vil'Jae will not be slithering her way into those sacred chambers."

traits.locale_text: “得知信者索罗蒙与他的猛犬会守护秘者的安眠，我的心里平静了不少。而且，这样一来，敌者婕伊就再也不会溜进那个神圣的房间了。”

languages.text: "Amik'Solomorne ve kendisinin canavar muhafızı Domin'in uyuduğunu bilmek içimi rahatlatıyor. Tabii Vil'Jae'ın sinsice o kutsal odalara giremeyeceğini bilmek de..."
languages.original_text: "It calms my heart to know that Amic'Solomorne and his beast guard the Domin's sleep. And that Vil'Jae will not be slithering her way into those sacred chambers."

traits.locale_text: "Amik'Solomorne ve kendisinin canavar muhafızı Domin'in uyuduğunu bilmek içimi rahatlatıyor. Ve de tabii Vil'Jae'nin sinsice o kutsal odalara giremeyeceğini bilmek..."

languages.original_text: "It calms my heart to know that Amic'Solomorne and his beast guard the Domin's sleep. And that Vil'Jae will not be slithering her way into those sacred chambers."

languages.text: « Cela m'apaise de savoir qu'Amic'Solomorne et son compagnon protègent le sommeil {mf|du|de la} Domin et que Vil'Jae ne se faufilera pas dans ces appartements sacrés. »
languages.original_text: "It calms my heart to know that Amic'Solomorne and his beast guard the Domin's sleep. And that Vil'Jae will not be slithering her way into those sacred chambers."

traits.locale_text: « Cela m'apaise de savoir qu'Amic'Solomorne et son compagnon protègent le sommeil {mf|du|de la} Domin et que Vil'Jae ne se faufilera pas dans ces appartements sacrés. »
